channel.title: Might & Magic (3DO R.I.P)
channel.description: I really used to love games of those series and I play them even now. My favorite of those games were Might and Might 4-5 and Heroes of Might and Magic III. For now I love to curse damn Ubisoft for killing the coolest storyline ever and making from it shitty soap opera. any fans here?

item.title: Might & Magic (3DO R.I.P)
item.dc:creator: Tosser_Sloth
item.description:
second and third of HEROES of might & magic are milestones. 4th was sacrilege. so much wrong.
tried to get into 5th but couldn’t.

HOMM3 is the third greatest game i know. after the half life & baldur’s gate series.

“might and magic”? never had the pleasure.

Read full topic

item.title: Might & Magic (3DO R.I.P)
item.dc:creator: Doom
item.description:
The only Might & Magic game I ever played was VII… and that was very long ago! I loved that game though. Maybe I should buy that Might & Magic 6-pack Imonfire linked…

item.title: Might & Magic (3DO R.I.P)
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
My favorite Might and Magic was the sixth. Incredible story, more than 300 hours of gameplay if you complete everything (and every single one of it is fun), beautiful soundtrack, and the list could go on indefinitely.

By the way, Might and Magic I - VI are available on GOG for ten bucks.

hercule poirots nutsack:

i like this one https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XS49Dazin3E

Dark Messiah shouldn’t have been apart of the M&M series. The back story has NOTHNIG (and I really mean NOTHING) to do with the real back story of the M&M series, the gameplay is totally different, etc. It really was just a slap in the face from Ubisoft to the Might and Magic fans when it came out.

Read full topic
